import React from 'react' import Header from '../Header/Header' import Banner from '../Banner/Banner' import Topdeals from '../TopDeals/Topdeals' import OnSaleProduct from '../OnSaleProducts/OnSaleProduct' import Banner1 from '../Banner1/Banner1' import Banner2 from '../Banner2/Banner2' import BestSelling from '../BestSelling/BestSelling' import Banner3 from '../Banner3/Banner3' import ShopByCategories from '../ShopByCategories/ShopByCategories' import Recommended from '../RecommendedProducts/Recommended' import CompanyLogo from '../companyLogos/CompanyLogo' import Footer from '../Footer/Footer' import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; import { useState } from 'react' import CartModal from '../CartModal/CartModal' export default function Home() { const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([]); const [isCartOpen, setIsCartOpen] = useState(false); const handleAddToCart = (item) => { setCartItems((prevItems) => [...prevItems, item]); setIsCartOpen(true); // Open the cart modal when an item is added }; const toggleCartModal = () => { setIsCartOpen((prevState) => !prevState); }; const TopDeals = [ { id:uuidv4(), title:"Apple iPhone 11 Pro 256GB Space Gray-Unlocked", price:168.00, screen:'Screen Size 10.9 inch', os:'Operating System iOS 14.0', inches:'Product Length 9.74 inch', discount:5, imageUrl:'https://demo-morata.myshopify.com/cdn/shop/products/products_5_1.jpg?v=1697644653&width=533', 3D,Video", price:96.00, screen:'Bass and Stereo Sound.', os:'Memory,Storage&SIM:12GB RAM, 256GB.', inches:'Display with 3088 * 1440 pixels resolution.', discount:20, imageUrl:'https://demo-morata.myshopify.com/cdn/shop/products/products_7_1.jpg?v=1697644677&width=533',
